#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,i,j,k,l;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(j=i;j<n;j++)
			cout<<" ";
		for(k=i;k>=1;k--)
			cout<<k;
		for(l=k+2;l<=i;l++)
			cout<<l;
		cout<<endl;
	}
	for(i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(j=1;j<=i;j++)
			cout<<" ";
		for(k=n-i;k>=1;k--)
			cout<<k;
		for(l=2;l<=n-i;l++)
			cout<<l;
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
